MPN-A & MPN-S
The correct grind and precise dose is very important in order to obtain a perfect cup of coffee.
 
The Faema MPN-A and MPN-S coffee dosing grinders, automatic (MPN-A) and semi-automatic (MPN-S), both continue the Faema history of quality.
   
TECHNICAL DATA
  MPN-A MPN-S
Automatic stop device when doser container is full of ground coffee  
Automatic stop device with timer cut off when lack of coffee beans in hopper (safety device for motor)
Output (kg/hr) 7 7
RPM 1400 1400
Grindstones flat flat
Capacity of coffee bean container (kg) 1 1
Capacily of the ground coffee container (gr) 150 200
Adjustable coffee dispenser from 5 to 9 gr
Colour burgundy, grey
Absorption 240W 240W
Voltage 110V, 60Hz
Weight (kg) 14 14
Dimensions (mm) (WxDxH) 200x350x580
The manufacturer reserves the right to modify the appliances without further notice.
